resources.string: Perplexy
Dummy Button
DUMMY\nCONTENT
Answered Wrong
Answered Right
Hey there! Are you stuck? Here\'s how I can help you.
Are you stuck? Buy a hint, or (Protip) go do some meditation.
Hi! Unable to solve this question? (Protip) Earn some coins and unlock another question.
Having difficulties? (Protip) Praying to the one true god, Thor, might solve the questioin.
You\'ve already answered this question correctly. You can view the solution in case you\'d like to see it.
This question has already been answered correctly!. (Protip) If you\'re running low on coins, watch a video.
You\'ve already got this one right! (Protip) Watch a video to help the poor questionmaker eat tonight. He\'s a liberal arts student. Just saying.
You had already solved this question. (Protip) Solve this question again and maybe you'll experience deja vu.
Aw, Snap! You answered this question wrong. (Protip) Magic is known to unlock questions. Just kidding, coins will do the trick.
You had previously answered this question wrong. (Protip) It costs less to unlock a wrong question than an unattempted one.
Did the question perplex you? Hmm. No wonder the app is named Perplexy.
Seems like you were unable to answer this correctly. (Protip) Answer all questions correctly to avoid seeing this suggestion.
Awesome! You answered this right. Move ahead to the next unlocked question. Remember, you always have a minimum of 3 unlocked questions.
Great work! (Protip) The more questions you answer, the faster your brain thinks, the easier it is to kill mosquitoes.
Amazing! If you loved this question, would you consider watching an ad? *puppy eyes*
This question is locked because you answered it wrong. (Protip) Don\'t answer it wrong next time.
Oops! That wasn\'t quite right. (Protip) Instead of trying another question, unlock this one and try again!
Perplexed! You got this wrong. (Protip) Unlock and try again. Or. Watch an ad and stay blessed.
This question hasn\'t been unlocked yet. Till then, keep calm and be a ninja.
This question hasn\'t been unlocked yet. Till then, keep calm and go to hogwarts
This question hasn\'t been unlocked yet. Till then, keep calm and kill zombies.
This question hasn\'t been unlocked yet. Till then, keep calm and freak out.
This question hasn\'t been unlocked yet. Till then, keep calm and snatch the snitch.
This question hasn\'t been unlocked yet. Till then, keep calm and stay sherlocked.
This question hasn\'t been unlocked yet. Till then, keep calm and stop crushing candies.
